name: Follow The Rules (NamezAndrei)
description:
Hollo Thomas! Its been a while hasn't it? Its good to have you back on the team after such a long time, we all missed you and we are very exited that you have returned. We have a lot of catching up to do but that is for another time. 

I know its been a good few years since you had to deal with things like this, so for your fist job, tonight i'll task you with keeping an eye on a small, abandoned office that is infested with entities.

Don't worry, all you will have to do is observe, get your assigned tasks done, survive and most important of all... Follow. The. Rules... The list should be somewhere on your desk, but you already know all of this!

You've been working with us for a long time before your departure so I am confident you will handle this job just fine! You were our best agent after all. Good luck!

   From_Paranormal Security and Observation Company

               _Overseer Jonah

Controls:

_Mouse = Look around / Interact

_F = Use Flashlight

Dev Note:   Hello everyone! This is my second ever game, and the first one that I managed  to release. It's basically a fnaf clone. Even though it isn't anything impressive, it still took me months to make so please don't be too harsh with the criticism. Thanks for playing!
